name: Doodle Grub
description:
* Ranked in Top #10 in USA, Top #5 in France, Germany etc. with more than 5 million downloads worldwide.*
* A brand new twist on a classic Snake game! *
* Extremely addictive gameplay for all ages and skill levels! *

★ PRESS REVIEWS ★
- "Doodle Grub is a MUST-HAVE, supercharged with fun and humor!" (5/5 stars, iPhoneSoft.fr)
- "A fully modernized snake for a super fun & addictive game. Don't hesitate a single moment, go download it! This game is a MUST-HAVE!" (5/5 stars, Appstore-Test.fr)
- “Bottom-line: it’s a fun, free game for kids" (4/5 stars, BestAppsForKids.com)

★ NEW ★
Follow the adventures of your favorite snake game character in a comic strip on http://www.doodlegrub-comic.com

Tilt your device to navigate the grub eating apples as you go. Earn points and grow in length. But be careful! Avoid collisions with nasty enemies moving around that will take the segments they touch. Once they hit the grub's head - the game is over!

Enjoy a great variety of amazing themes - including Halloween, Christmas, St. Valentine, Jurassic, Underwater - with tons of fearsome enemies and unexpected events!

★ FEATURES ★
• 5 FREE and 6 unlockable themes with unique enemies
• Discover the new Doodle Grub theme music! With ambiance variations adapted to each theme
• Charming graphics optimized for Retina Display
• Intuitive and responsive tilt controls
• Support for OpenFeint and Game Center leaderboards and achievements
• Integration of GameFeed social network
• Online and Bluetooth multiplayer modes
• Twitter and Facebook support

Play with your friends, share your high scores, discover secret achievements and compete for the top spot on the leaderboards! Doodle Grub is a fun and addicting treat for the whole family!



★ FOLLOW US ★
Twitter: http://twitter.com/DoodleGrub
Facebook: http://facebook.com/DoodleGrubGame
